casebody.data:
STATE
v.
George Reynold EVANS 200P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 12, 2018 Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Jon David, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. George Reynold Evans, for Evans, George Reynold.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th of July 2018 by Petitioner of Writ of Mandamus as Alternative of the Writ of Habeas Corpus:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 12th of July 2018."
